original_text: Then he poured water into a basin and began to wash the disciples' feet and to wipe them with the towel that was wrapped around him.
korean_text: 이에 대야에 물을 떠서 제자들의 발을 씻으시고 그 두르신 수건으로 닦기를 시작하여

sentences.original_text: Then he poured water into a basin
and began to wash the disciples' feet
and to wipe them with the towel
